values:
Good afternoon.

Haven't wrote in this in a while. well i wasn't in college for a whole week and a half oppsie....but i went in this week with difficulty.

What have i been up to? lol..... going out getting smashed partying in the best places with great people....what more could i want? Oh yes. A holiday.... a wish that is granted with the slightest of ease. 

Nothing else to say. :) 

peace

Well well well, look what rolled in, a new year. And what does the new year entail? Most likely a cocktail of drugs, music and booze, wasted days, long nights, clubs, people, college, holidays, spontanious moments, driving lessons (new years ressi) and who the fuck knows? Leave it to fate and the moon.

Well i spent some of the 31st in the dental hospital being told my wisdom tooth needs pulled out... i need all the wisdom i can get too :( Wasn't going to go out but was dragged out by a drunk sister and her man to yates then bamboo which personally i can't stand but i was on the guest list, stayed for the bells, went for another drink and left myself to go to china white, partied with cleo in the vip area, rested in the strange lil arabian room at the back of the vip lounge with a canadian girl and left at four, driven of course by my chauffeur. 

A good start to the new year. :)
Santa- I robbed that bitch last night!

Well....had the baby (loui) over the weekend, took too many drugs as per usual, landed me a cool job for tonight at a big castle in stirling, been wined and dined, china whites vip lounge,played pool and won, crazy people and crazy times. All jamming :)
MDMA and skunk- godsend. Rave on!

My weekend has been great minus three days of non-sleep. But there is evil in the darkness. i was in the cathouse, yes THE CATHOUSE last night. seeing everyone there was amazing.Dont know what the fuck went on afterwards but that shall be sorted out soon enough. 

peace

My gran died today. (what a first liner huh?)

Yeah, no emotion on the subject.

Its all karma in my eyes....my dads mom dying...i wont go into detail but trust me on this one.

Lets just hope that i can get fucked up this weekend and perhaps show what i really think about the subject.

RIP Iris x

still waiting on a viewing date for this fuckin house which the assholes havent sent thru so ill have to fone. spoke to jon by for the first time in a while which is always a good thing

called up the social so i can sign on- the highlight of my life lol

uh charlie and the chocolate factory was dissapointing but failing that grass helped which is always a plus. I never thought i would say this but im actually starting to miss america :( pathetic to say the least but when u come from glasgow skegness could even be missed when left!

booking amsterdam soon anyway so it doesnt matter....another weekend another world

so cant be assed.

Well back from ohio and i would say its great to be home but it aint really. Regardless, i has the most amazing time of my life at the gathering- words just can not explain. 
anyway. thats all i really wanted to say.

peace x

Bye everyone. see yall in eight days time. 

peace x

Till i hawl my ass to ohio for the time of my life not to mention some peace....much needed peace.

and light of course.

birthday next sunday too....gonna be 18, finally. 

anyway...

im out.

the whole trip is complete....just gotta turn up at the airport now lol

so stoked.
uh i got my gathering ticket! Nuff fucking said.

well today i was supposed to work but shit...summin came up...thats all good....

so i spent an hour with lil nikki speaking of future events. 

Then i came home and worked out for a good hour...lol thats right....worked out...smoking ciggs along the way of course...so if im sore in the morning then I'll know why!

Inside out was fucking incredible! Everybody in the house was out their fucking trees and it was ekki luvin' all round! 

Well the days great and from thursday me and nikki gonna get our selve's some fucking cush! haha love it!

You are a maniac
killer.
It doesn't matter who they are and what they
have or haven't done. You still want to kill
them. And for a simple reason only; it's fun.
Seeing people in pain is like ecstasy. Maybe
you have some sort of mental problems or you
are this way because of previous deep scars,
only you know. But now you are sadistic and
maybe you only like to see a special group of
people be in pain (e.g. preps). However you are
not the most social person in the bunch and
people think you are weird. That bothers you
somewhat but atleast you can entertain yourself
with daydreaming about killing them. After all,
they have no idea what's coming.

Main weapon: Explosives and torture
equpiment
Quote: "Insanity: a perfect
rational adjustment to an insane world" -
R.D. Lang
Facial expression: Wicked smile

nothing could ruin this feeling....

another day another drink.

worked today for the first time in ages and it werent bad cept the boss gave up weed which blows monkeys baws but what the fuck can ya do?

er....mad chats with nikki, (ah bonjourno) and with kursty bebe (3 outta 500? aint too fucking bad or was it 5000?) who the fuck knows....anyway better go out sat or the moz as i am getting booohhherrrd in herre! (shit did i just say that? oh fuck it, blow me!)

well im off to bed....take it up with the judge and ill survive in the morning...

er jd...if your reading this email me some love....or not :(

rachel wheres the mojhiotos when ya need them? (thats the right spelling by the way, cheers siggi!) 

over and out... and no houston...we dont have no problem.

bite it! mmmmmm deven......no one understands....cept...???? i'll holla back at ya gurl for that one... wheres tina when u need here...aussie fucking land....beeyatch better score me some weed! 

put it down her pants and get back to me with that one!
er mad junk ball banging the door? whats that all about?
